node.title: Family breaks down as video of Ahmaud Arbery's last minutes shown at trial of men accused of murdering black jogger
node.alt: People gather at a wall with a mural painted of Ahmaud Arbery.
node.description: On the opening day of arguments, prosecutors reveal footage of the 25-year-old's fatal shooting, saying he was "under attack" when three white men in pickup trucks chased him through a neighbourhood in Georgia.
node.content:
["Ahmaud Arbery was \"under attack\" when three white men in pickup trucks chased the black jogger through a mostly white neighbourhood in southern Georgia before killing him with a shotgun, a prosecutor has told the jury in the men's murder trial.", "Gregory McMichael, 65, his son Travis McMichael, 35, and neighbour William \"Roddie\" Bryan, 52, have pleaded not guilty to charges of murder, aggravated assault and false imprisonment for shooting Arbery dead on February 23, 2020.", "They later said they thought Mr Arbery might have been fleeing a crime and were trying to detain him under the state's now-repealed citizen's arrest statute in a neighbourhood their lawyers say was \"on edge\" over reports of thefts.", "\"It is a citizen's job to help the police, and the law authorises that,\" Robert Rubin, a lawyer representing the younger McMichael, said in his opening statement.", "", "
Greg McMichael, Travis McMichael and William Bryan are facing trial over\u00a0the murder of\u00a0Ahmaud Arbery.(Reuters)
", "
Pickup truck a '5,000-pound lethal weapon'
", "The defendants' own words undermine their defence, prosecutor Linda Dunikoski said in her opening statement.", "The men had \"assumed the worst\" upon seeing a Black man running down their street on a warm Sunday afternoon in Satilla Shores, a residential area near the small coastal city of Brunswick.", "The McMichaels grabbed a handgun and a 12-gauge shotgun and jumped in the son's pickup truck after Mr Arbery ran by their driveway.", "\"I assumed something was up,\" Travis McMichael later told police when explaining why he and his father chased Mr Arbery, Ms Dunikoski told the jury, composed of 11 white people and one Black person, in Glynn County Superior Court in Brunswick.", "Mr Bryan saw the pursuit as it came near his home and jumped in his own pickup truck.", "Ms Dunikoski called the truck a \"5,000-pound lethal weapon\" that Mr Bryan swerved toward Mr Arbery four times to angle him off the road into a ditch.", "", "
Ms Dunikoski said the three men's actions were based on assumptions.\u00a0(AP: Octavio Jones)
", "Mr Bryan got so close that they found Mr Arbery's handprint and fibers from his white T-shirt on the truck, she told the jury.", "\"All three of these defendants did everything they did based on assumptions,\" Ms Dunikoski said as she showed videos of Mr Arbery's final minutes, including mobile phone video of the shooting recorded by Mr Bryan.", "\"They made decisions in their driveways based on those assumptions that took a young man's life, and that is why we are here.\"", "
Arbery's father leaves the courtroom
", "Ms Dunikoski said the defendants had deadly intent, pointing to something the elder McMichael told police he shouted at Mr Arbery: \"Stop or I'll blow your f***ing head off!\"", "She said he also told police they had trapped Mr Arbery \"like a rat\".", "", "
Mr Arbery's death has often been invoked during protests against racial injustice.(AP: Damian Dovarganes)
", "Mr Arbery's father left the courtroom before Mr Bryan's mobile phone video of the shooting was played, which shows the younger McMichael pointing his shotgun at Mr Arbery, who runs towards it before the fatal shots are fired.", "Mr Arbery's mother sobbed into a man's shoulder in the courtroom gallery.", "Mr Rubin said in his opening statement that Travis McMichael had been frightened that Mr Arbery might have been armed, though it would turn out the jogger did not even have his mobile phone on him.", "The man opened fire in self-defence as Mr Arbery tried to grab his shotgun, Mr Rubin said, and was left distraught and covered in Mr Arbery's blood.", "
Controversy over nearly all-white jury
", "In the months before the shooting, reports went around Satilla Shores of property crimes, unsettling residents of a once-idyllic place in which to raise a family, Mr Rubin told the jury.", "Mr Arbery had been seen in security-camera video roaming around an unoccupied half-built house near the McMichaels' on several occasions in the months leading up to the shooting.", "", "
The McMichaels weren't arrested until May when a video of the incident posted on social media stirred a national outcry.(AP: John Bazemore)
", "The property owner, Larry English, shared some of the video with the neighbours, and Travis McMichael was among those who saw the older videos, according to prosecutors and defence counsel.", "The prosecution told the jury they would see a deposition by Mr English, who has said nothing was taken from his property on the days Mr Arbery was there, and that he believes Mr Arbery would use a water source on the site to quench his thirst.", "Controversy erupted on Wednesday, the final day of jury selection, when prosecutors objected to a final jury consisting of\u00a011 whites and one black juror.", "They argued that defence attorneys had cut eight potential jurors from the final panel because they were black, which the US Supreme Court has declared unconstitutional.", "Superior Court Judge Timothy Walmsley agreed that there appeared to be \"intentional discrimination\", but said Georgia law limited his authority to intervene because defence attorneys stated non-racial reasons for excluding black panellists from the jury.", "Reuters/AP"]
